patthana15.67:1.1_0: Niyyānikaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyyāniko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.67:1.1_1: Aniyyānikaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyyāniko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.67:2.1_0: Aniyyānikaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyyāniko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
